5.0.0-beta.1.title: New Beta Available - 5.0.0-beta.2
5.0.0-beta.1.content: Version 5.0.0-beta.2 is now available - the first version with full Apple Developer ID code signing and notarization! No more security warnings on macOS. Also includes performance improvements and startup optimizations. Before you install beta 2, please delete the contents of your settings directory. (~/Library/Application Support/CSTReader on Mac) The subdirectories and some settings files have been renamed for consistency.

default.title: Outdated Version
default.content: A newer version is available with bug fixes and performance improvements. Please consider updating to the latest release.

announcements.title: macOS Keychain Issue Resolved
announcements.content: (Example message) The persistent keychain access prompt on macOS has been fixed in beta.2. The application no longer triggers keychain requests during normal operation.

announcements.title: Automatic XML Updates Now Available
announcements.content: (Example message) CST Reader now automatically checks for and downloads updated Pali texts from GitHub. Files are only downloaded when changes are detected, saving bandwidth and time.

announcements.title: Enhanced Search Functionality
announcements.content: (Example message) Search now supports wildcards and regular expressions across all 14 Pali scripts. The new incremental indexing system significantly improves startup performance.

criticalNotices.message: (Example message) Critical: Alpha versions have a known data corruption issue. Please upgrade immediately to beta.2 or later to avoid potential data loss.
